name: On This Day
notice: This file is auto generated, do not edit this file manually. This project is WIP, format may change in the future.

data.description: @Carlini8N revealed the @PurrnelopesCC Team with his post: Purrnelopes Country Club â€” The UnAnon https://medium.com/@Carlini/purrnelopes-country-club-the-unanon-342ab01f0471
All 10,000 @PurrnelopesCC Cats were minted https://pcc-archive.org/collections/cats. The PCC Team updated its Roadmap 1.0 https://purrnelope.medium.com/thank-you-and-roadmaps-33fa6c0eb1c7

The Liquidity Pool for @PurrnelopesCC Cats was launched on NFTX. You can buy, sell, and swap Cats instantly from the pool. And there are some nice Cats in the pool. https://nftx.io/vault/0xe581f272706581f9dcc362df3c7934e99192c492
1st @PurrnelopesCC PurrCast (https://pcc-archive.org/posts/tags/purr-cast) with Carlini, Yoda and Hudah https://pcc-archive.org/posts/2021/09/24/purrcast/

1st KittyVault Purrks, Hoodie Cat NFT, was airdropped to Cats owners. The Hoodie Cat can be redeemed for KittyVault fractions, or for Physical @PurrnelopesCC Hoodie. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/kittyvault-purrks/hoodie-cat
1st @PurrnelopesCC Weekly Update video (https://pcc-archive.org/posts/tags/weekly-update) by @Hippapasta https://pcc-archive.org/posts/weekly-update/2021w39

2nd KittyVault Purrks, Kitten Basket NFT, was airdropped to Cats owners. The Kitten Basket can be redeemed for @PurrnelopesCC Kittens NFT. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/kittyvault-purrks/kitten-basket
@PurrnelopesCC Kittens mint started. Kittens are the the 1st companions to the Cats, redeemed with Kitten Basket NFT. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/kittens/

3rd KittyVault Purrks, Model Cat NFT, was airdropped to Cats owners. The Model Cat NFT can be redeemed for KittyVault fractions, or for Physical @PurrnelopesCC Model Cat. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/kittyvault-purrks/model-cat
.pcc.eth ENS Subdomains started to claim for free for all @PurrnelopesCC Cats holders. https://pcc-archive.org/ens

4th KittyVault Purrks, Comic Cat NFT, was airdropped to Cats owners. The Comic Cat NFT can be redeemed for KittyVault fractions, or for Physical @PurrnelopesCC Comic Book. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/kittyvault-purrks/comic-cat

5th KittyVault Purrks, Record Cat NFT, was airdropped to Cats owners. The Record Cat NFT can be redeemed for KittyVault fractions, or for Physical @PurrnelopesCC Vinyl Record. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/kittyvault-purrks/record-cat
1st @PurrnelopesCC Planner (https://pcc-archive.org/artwork/purrnelopes-planner/) https://twitter.com/PurrnelopesCC/status/1490789361339797504
@PurrnelopesCC revealed its Roadmap 2.0 https://pcc-archive.org/posts/2022/02/25/post/roadmap-2-0-6-months-on-from-launch

6th KittyVault Purrks, Keyboard Cat NFT, was airdropped to Cats owners. The Keyboard Cat NFT can be redeemed for KittyVault fractions, or for Physical @PurrnelopesCC Keyboard. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/kittyvault-purrks/keyboard-cat
@PurrnelopesCC Cats showed up in NYC Times Square! https://pcc-archive.org/posts/2022/03/07/post/times-square

7th KittyVault Purrks, Ledger Cat NFT, was airdropped to Cats owners. The Ledger Cat NFT can be redeemed for KittyVault fractions, or for Physical @PurrnelopesCC Ledger Hardware Wallet. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/kittyvault-purrks/ledger-cat

8th KittyVault Purrks, Grandma's Nightstand NFT, was airdropped to Cats owners. The Grandma's Nightstand can be redeemed for @PurrnelopesCC Grandmas NFT. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/kittyvault-purrks/grandma-s-nightstand
@PurrnelopesCC launched its Merch Store with PCC branded t-shirts, caps, mugs and more. https://pcc-archive.org/merch/

@PurrnelopesCC Grandmas mint started. Grandmas are the the 2nd companions to the Cats, redeemed with Grandma's Nightstand NFT. The image will change if you own the grandma and cat with the same id. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/grandmas/
@PurrnelopesCC Physical Model Cat claim opened. Those 3D printed physical models are made with @alchemy_plastic. And you can have your .pcc.eth name on it. https://pcc-archive.org/merch/pcc-model-cat
@PurrnelopesCC Exclusives NFT mint started. Purrnelope's Exclusives are $TOKEN Yielding NFTs with 5 categories yield up to 100 TOKEN daily. https://pcc-archive.org/collections/exclusives/
